text: Keiunta Denard Span (born February 27, 1984) is an American professional baseball player for the Tampa Bay Rays. He is an outfielder. He has also played for the Minnesota Twins, Washington Nationals, and the San Francisco Giants. Span bats and throws left-handed. He is also one of the top defensive players. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:Minnesota Twins players Category:San Francisco Giants players Category:Washington Nationals players Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C. Category:African-American baseball players
title: Denard Span
